exceptions.tactic: apply alwI with (P := P) (Q := fun v s' => Q v s').
exceptions.exn: In environment this : nid W : world A : Type s : state p : proc A P : Prop Q : A -> state -> Prop H : alwsafe s p H' : after s p (fun (v : A) (s' : state) => P -> Q v s') The term "fun v : A => [eta Q v]" has type "A -> state -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "state -> proc ?A -> Prop" (cannot unify "state" and "A").
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: apply alwI' with (P := P) (Q := fun v s' => Q v s').
exceptions.exn: In environment this : nid W : world A : Type s : state p : proc A P : Prop Q : A -> state -> Prop H : alwsafe s p H' : P -> after s p (fun v : A => [eta Q v]) The term "fun v : A => [eta Q v]" has type "A -> state -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "state -> proc ?A -> Prop" (cannot unify "state" and "A").

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s: state
p: proc A
P: Prop
Q: A -> state -> Prop

Goal:
alwsafe s p -> after s p (fun (v : A) (s' : state) => P -> Q v s') <-> (P -> after s p (fun v : A => [eta Q v]))

Premises:
eta : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> Type) (f : forall x : A, B x), f = [eta f]
Notation alwsafe s p := (always s p (fun=> xPredT))
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
after : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
alwI : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : Prop) (Q : state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always s p (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => P -> Q s' p') < -> (P -> always s p (fun s' : state => [eta Q s']))
alwI' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : Prop) (Q : state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always_sc s p scs (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => P -> Q s' p') < -> (P -> always_sc s p scs (fun s' : state => [eta Q s']))
aft_bnd : forall (A B : Type) (p1 : proc A) (p12 : proc B) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc B)) (s1 : state) (P : B -> state -> Prop), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> after s1 p1 (fun (v : A) (s : state) => forall p : proc B, p \In pp2 v -> after s p P) -> after s1 p12 P
alwA : forall (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : B -> state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe s p -> always s p (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => forall x : B, P x s' p') < -> (forall x : B, always s p (fun s' : state => [eta P x s']))
alwA' : forall (A B : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : B -> state -> proc A -> Prop), alwsafe_sc s p scs -> always_sc s p scs (fun (s' : state) (p' : proc A) => forall x : B, P x s' p') < -> (forall x : B, always_sc s p scs (fun s' : state => [eta P x s']))
alw_bnd : forall (A B : Type) (p1 : proc A) (p12 : proc B) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc B)) (s1 : state) (P : state -> B -> Prop), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc A) => forall (p : proc B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> always s2 p (fun (s : state) (q : proc B) => forall v0 : B, q = Ret v0 -> P s v0)) -> always s1 p12 (fun (s : state) (p : proc B) => forall v : B, p = Ret v -> P s v)
alwsafe_bnd : forall (A B : Type) (p1 : proc A) (p12 : proc B) (s1 : state) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc B)), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc A) => forall (p : proc B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> alwsafe s2 p) -> alwsafe s1 p12
alw_refl : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> P s p
alw_refl' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p sc P -> P s p
alw_safe : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> forall sc : schedule, safe p sc s
alw_coh : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In coherent
alw_safe' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p (sc :: scs) P -> safe p sc s
alw_coh' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In coherent
iffRL : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> Q -> P
iffLR : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> P -> Q
alw_imp : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P1 P2 : state -> proc A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc A), s0 \In coherent -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always s p P1 -> always s p P2
alw_envsq : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p1 : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p1 P -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc A) => forall s3 : state, network_rely W this s2 s3 -> P s3 p2)
alw_envs : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P
alw_step : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> pstep s1 p sc s2 q -> always s2 q P
proc_progress : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc A), pstep s p sc s' p'
alw_imp' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P1 P2 : state -> proc A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc A), s0 \In coherent -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always_sc s p scs P1 -> always_sc s p scs P2
alwp_envsq : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p1 : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s1 p1 scs P -> always_sc s1 p1 scs (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc A) => forall s3 : state, network_rely W this s2 s3 -> P s3 p2)
alw_envs' : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s1 p scs P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always_sc s2 p scs P
alw_act : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> exists S : a_safe a s2, P s2 (Act a) /\ (forall (s3 : state) (v : A) (s4 : state), a_step S s3 v -> network_rely W this s3 s4 -> P s4 (Ret v))) -> always s1 (Act a) P
alw_ret : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always s1 (Ret v) P
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
alw_ret' : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), s1 \In coherent -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always_sc s1 (Ret v) scs P

```coq
intros. split; intro H.
- apply alwI with (P := P) (Q := fun v s' => Q v s'). auto.
- apply alwI' with (P := P) (Q := fun v s' => Q v s'). auto.
Qed.

original: intros. split; intro H. - apply alwI with (P := P) (Q := fun v s' => Q v s'). auto. - apply alwI' with (P := P) (Q := fun v s' => Q v s'). auto.
